description: Detects block of attempt to disable real time protection of Microsoft Defender by tamper protection
name: Microsoft Defender Tamper Protection Trigger
query: (winlog.channel:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational" AND winlog.event_id:"5013" AND Value:(*\\Windows\ Defender\\DisableAntiSpyware\ \=\ 0x1\(\) OR *\\Real\-Time\ Protection\\DisableRealtimeMonitoring\ \=\ \(Current\)))
author: Bhabesh Raj
